asset.hookText:
Subscribe to our channel:
http://bit.ly/12dY9oO

Spend your holiday with Petco:
http://www.petco.com/holiday

Have problems with your dog jumping on or going potty on your Christmas tree? Petco Dog Training Expert Fanna Easter talks about how to keep your dog away from the Christmas tree this holiday season.

Things to remember:
- Put a baby gate around the tree
- Put a smaller tree on a 3-foot stand
- Stop dogs from going potty or chewing the tree decorations

Something extraordinary happens when pets and people connect. A unique bond is formed that results in something powerful, not only between pets and people, but in a way that makes the world a better place. Our promise is to nurture that relationship completely - mind and body.
